caption.p: Inter-model relationships among ENSO, IOD and its atmospheric correlations. Inter-model relationship in present-day climate between ( a) ENSO-SLP correlation and ENSO amplitude, ( b) IOD amplitude and ENSO amplitude, ( c) IOD-ISMR correlation and ENSO amplitude, and ( d) IOD-ISMR correlation and ENSO-SLP correlation. The observations and MMEM are shown as the black circle and black asterisk, respectively. Each colored symbol represents a CMIP5 model. Solid line in each plot denotes the linear regression line with correlation coefficient (C), p-value (P) and regression coefficient (S) provided. A p-value smaller than 0.05 means statistical significance above the 95% confidence level. All plots were generated by NCL version 6.3.0 ( http://dx.doi.org/10.5065/D6WD3XH5).
